name: Amazon Echo Material
description:
A layout for your amazon echo desktop app that is based on the Google material design. 
It is a work in progress, but this is a start.
css:

#dee-search-bar{border:none;background-color:#fff}.dee-notification-details{position:relative;background:#fff;padding:1.25rem;font-size:.875rem;font-weight:200;color:#333;margin:.625rem 1.3125rem .625rem 1.3125rem;border-radius:2px;-moz-box-shadow:0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.23);-webkit-box-shadow:0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.16),0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.23);box-shadow:0 3px 6px
